mapper.select: select a.prdid,a.salescount, (select enuitemlabel from ptenudetail where enutype = 'SVTPRDTYPE' and enuitemvalue = a.prdid) as prdname from (select count(*) as salescount, prdid from svprdsalinf t group by t.prdid) a order by a.salescount desc

select * from (select * from (select (select deptname from ptdept where deptid = b.deptid) as deptname, sum(a.salesnum1) as totalnum,b.deptid from svprdsalinf a, ptoper b where a.tellerid = b.operid and a.prdid = #{prdid} group by b.deptid) t order by totalnum desc) where rownum <= 10

select * from (select * from (select (select deptname from ptdept where deptid = b.deptid) as deptname, round(sum(a.salesamt1)/10000,0) as totalnum,b.deptid from svprdsalinf a, ptoper b where a.tellerid = b.operid and a.prdid = #{prdid} group by b.deptid) t order by totalnum desc) where rownum <= 10
